main event: Two military personnel observed a bright light changing color from red to green while traveling between Karachi and Quetta, Pakistan on April 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was moving erratically and was observed for approximately 15 minutes., The report mentions the possibility of the object being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., The object was confirmed by two military officers., The sighting occurred at 0540 hours local time., The report highlights the object's tremendous altitude and speed in relation to stars.
